help.title: Help
help.whatIsText: Mini Games is a collection of small interactive games designed to help you learn and have fun at the same time.
help.quizText: Test your knowledge with different types of quizzes. Each quiz gives instant feedback and a final score.
help.comingText: New games and features are under development. Stay tuned!
help.openSourceText: This project is open source and community-driven. You can explore the code, suggest improvements, or contribute new features and games. Together we build and improve the platform.
